solution_line_template: Each drink uses {total_cups_per_drink} cups because {iced_tea_per_drink} cup + {lemonade_per_drink} cup = <<{total_cups_per_drink}={total_cups_per_drink}>>{total_cups_per_drink} cups
The pitcher contains {num_drinks} total drinks because {total_pitcher_cups} / {total_cups_per_drink} = <<{total_pitcher_cups}/{total_cups_per_drink}={num_drinks}>>{num_drinks}
There are {total_lemonade} cups of lemonade in the pitcher because {num_drinks} x {lemonade_per_drink} = {total_lemonade}
